title: Typographic design research study-Need Typographer for User Testing
content:
I am Sonika Gondval, student of Master of Design in Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur, India. I am in my second year and doing thesis on "emotions in typefaces". For my thesis I need opinions about typefaces which were put on the movie posters to study context and typeface together. I have made a online questionnaire. It will take only 15 minutes. If you could help me, Kindly reply to this email Id- [sonikagondval@gmail.com](mailto:sonikagondval@gmail.com) or if you are interested in participating can comment below with your email id. I will send you the link of the Questionnaire.  
Thanks.
author: sonika
